kmclifetime.help: Kinetic Monte Carlo simulations of multiple singlets or triplets in periodic boundary conditions with finite lifetime
kmclifetime.label: calc:kmclifetime

insertions.help: How often charges are allowed to decay

maxrealtime.help: Maximum realtime after which the run should abort

seed.help: Integer to initialise the random number generator

numberofcharges.help: Number of excitons in the simulation box

injection.help: Name pattern that specifies on which sites injection is possible. Before injecting on a site it is checked whether the column 'name' in the table 'segments' of the state file matches this pattern. Use the wildcard '*' to inject on any site.

lifetime.help: xml file with the lifetime of an exciton on each segment

carriertype.help: Options: singlet,triplet. Specifies the carrier type of the transport under consideration.

temperature.help: Temperature in Kelvin. Will only be relevant if rates are calculated by KMC and not taken from the state file.

rates.help: Options: statefile/calculate. statefile: use the rates for charge transfer specified in the state file; calculate: use transfer integrals, site energies and reorganisation energies specified in the state file as well as temperature specified here to calculate rates before starting the KMC simulation.

carrierenergy.help: Write the energy of the first carrier to a file

alpha.help: exponential averageing, set to 1 to retrieve insantaneous energies

outputsteps.help: Specifies the interval between energy outputs
